query: I’m looking for papers about Tau protein aggregation and its roles and implications in the Alzheimer’s disease (AD), written in 2011 in Journal of Neuroscience. Especially the ones mentioning tau aggregation. Include only the papers written by E. Waxman. I’m especially interested in papers that propose a human-derived cellular model.
ground_truth_papers: Induction of Intracellular Tau Aggregation Is Promoted by α-Synuclein Seeds and Provides Novel Insights into the Hyperphosphorylation of Tau.
